title: Small Intelligent Recommendation Slider (Multi-Currency) - Manual
description: Inserts a slider with intelligent recommendation items.

widget.label: Insert Selector
widget.description: Selector to find the node where the slider will be inserted.

widget.label: Insert Method
widget.description: Method to use when inserting the slider relative to the selected node.
RecheckForElement: If the selector is not found, wait up to 3 seconds for it to show up. SelectMultipleElements: If the selector matches multiple places, do you want to insert at each of them?
widget.label: Insert Options

input.name: json

widget.label: Maximum Number of Items
widget.description: Maximum number of merch items to have in the slider.

input.name: sliderTemplate
input.value:
Intelligent Recommendation Slider (Multi-Currency)

Previous
{{SLIDER}}
Next

widget.label: Slider Container Template
widget.description: Include an HTML template to build the slider structure. Placeholder example: '{{slider}}'. Possible placeholders: slider, pagination. Optionally, add the attributes 'data-prev-button' and 'data-next-button' to add previous and next slide buttons. If optional arrow images are included, elements with the attribute 'data-prev-button' and 'data-next-button' are required for them to display.

input.name: itemTemplate
input.value:
{{title|truncate: 65}}
{{salePrice|localizeSalePrice}} {{price|localizePrice}}

widget.label: Slide Template
widget.description: Placeholder example: '{{price}}'. Possible placeholders include all product catalog fields. Examples: title, id, itemGroupId, price, salePrice, link, imageLink
CSS appended to the DOM in a <style> or <link> element. Use the placeholder '#MONETATE-ID' as the selector for action's wrapper id.
widget.label: CSS
Previous Button Creative
widget.description: Previous button creative. Must include element with the attribute [data-prev-button] Slider Container Template.

widget.label: Next Button Creative
widget.description: Next button creative. Must include element with the attribute [data-next-button] Slider Container Template.
